### Related work

Population pyramids are common tools for epidemiologists and there are several
solutions in R. To our knowledge, the {apyramid} package is the only one that
allows for non-binary splitting variable.

 - [pyramid::pyramid()](https://cran.r-project.org/package=pyramid)
 - [epiDisplay::pyramid()](https://cran.r-project.org/package=epiDisplay)
